headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and major calls to action. Use italic variants for emphasis.

body.usage: UI elements, descriptions, form inputs, metadata.

spacing.scale: Tailwind default but doubled for luxury feel (p-8, p-12, p-16)

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-fuchsia-500 to-violet-600 text-white font-medium px-8 py-3 rounded-full hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(217,70,239,0.4)] transition-all duration-300 transform hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white/5 border border-white/10 text-white px-6 py-3 rounded-full hover:bg-white/10 transition-all

cards.listing: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-xl bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/5 hover:border-fuchsia-500/30 transition-all duration-500
cards.feature: p-8 rounded-2xl bg-gradient-to-br from-white/5 to-transparent border border-white/5 hover:bg-white/10 transition-all

inputs.default: bg-black/20 border border-white/10 rounded-lg px-4 py-3 text-white placeholder:text-gray-600 focus:border-fuchsia-500/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-fuchsia-500/50 transition-all outline-none

home_page.structure: Asymmetrical grid showcasing top profiles, categories, and featured events. Mix of tall (portrait) and wide (landscape) blocks.
home_page.hero: Full-screen immersive video/image background with 'Midnight Velvet' gradient overlay. Centered, elegant typography.

listing_page.structure: Responsive grid (1 col mobile, 2 col tablet, 3-4 col desktop). Each card focuses on the image with minimal text overlay.
listing_page.filters: Sidebar on desktop, Bottom Sheet on mobile. Glassmorphism style.

profile_page.structure: Large hero image, sticky booking/contact card on right (desktop). Content flows centrally with rich typography.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME ENFORCEMENT: The app must be DARK MODE ONLY. Do not implement a light mode toggle. The vibe is 'Nightlife'.
2. FONT INSTALLATION: You must import 'Playfair Display' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. SHADCN CUSTOMIZATION: When using Shadcn components (Dialog, Dropdown, etc.), override the default white backgrounds with 'bg-zinc-950' or 'bg-black' and add 'border-white/10'.
4. IMAGERY: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for the initial populate. Do not leave empty gray boxes.
5. PRIVACY UI: Implement 'Blur Reveal' effects for sensitive content (images start blurred, unblur on hover/click).
6. GOLD ACCENTS: Use the Amber-500 color sparingly for 'Verified' badges and 'Premium' features to create value.
7. MOBILE FIRST: Ensure the bottom navigation bar is glassmorphic and floats above the content on mobile.
8. NO GENERIC ICONS: Use Lucide-React icons with thin strokes (stroke-width={1.5}) to match the elegant typography.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on click. Links should have underline animations.
Spacing: Use p-8 where you would normally use p-4.
Data-Test-IDs: Every interactive element must have a data-testid attribute.
